mapper.select: SELECT STND_DATE AS stndDate, TX_ID AS txId, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, OPER_START_TIME AS operStartTime, OPER_END_TIME AS operEndTime, MODEL_NAME AS modelName, TOTAL_OPER_TIME AS totalOperTime, REAL_OPER_TIME AS realOperTime, NONE_OPER_TIME AS noneOperTime FROM ATMS_SLA_E0

SELECT STND_DATE AS stndDate, TX_ID AS txId, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, OPER_START_TIME AS operStartTime, OPER_END_TIME AS operEndTime, MODEL_NAME AS modelName, TOTAL_OPER_TIME AS totalOperTime, REAL_OPER_TIME AS realOperTime, NONE_OPER_TIME AS noneOperTime FROM ATMS_SLA_E0 WHERE STND_DATE = #{stndDate}, TX_ID = #{txId}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_SLA_E0 WHERE STND_DATE = #{stndDate}, TX_ID = #{txId}

UPDATE ATMS_SLA_E0 SET CORP_CODE = #{corpCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, OPER_START_TIME = #{operStartTime}, OPER_END_TIME = #{operEndTime}, MODEL_NAME = #{modelName}, TOTAL_OPER_TIME = #{totalOperTime}, REAL_OPER_TIME = #{realOperTime}, NONE_OPER_TIME = #{noneOperTime} WHERE STND_DATE = #{stndDate}, TX_ID = #{txId}

INSERT INTO ATMS_SLA_E0 ( STND_DATE, TX_ID, CORP_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, TERMINAL_NO, OPER_START_TIME, OPER_END_TIME, MODEL_NAME, TOTAL_OPER_TIME, REAL_OPER_TIME, NONE_OPER_TIME ) VALUES ( #{stndDate}, #{txId}, #{corpCode}, #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{terminalNo}, #{operStartTime}, #{operEndTime}, #{modelName}, #{totalOperTime}, #{realOperTime}, #{noneOperTime} )
